name: Millitaur
resist: poison; bludgeoning and slashing from nonmagical weapons

action.name: Multiattack
text: The millitaur makes two handaxe attacks.

action.name: Handaxe
text: Melee Weapon Attack: +6 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. Hit: 11 (2d6 + 4) slashing damage plus 2 (1d4) poison damage.
